Class Host

Direct Known Subclasses:
LocalHost, Loopback
public class Host extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.StringFormattable, Comparable<Host>
Represents a host on a network, for which Ports can be retrieved.

Attributes

A host has a network name() and a description(). If the port is on the localhost, isLocal() will return true. If the port can be resolved to an address, isResolvable() will return true and address() will return the resolved address. The canonical name can be retrieved with canonicalName().

Creation

  • parseHost(Listener, String)
  • parseHost(Listener, String, String)
  • hostSwitchParser(Listener, String, String)

Hosts

  • LocalHost.localhost()
  • Loopback.loopback()
  • nullHost()

Properties

  • address()
  • canonicalName()
  • description()
  • dnsName()
  • isLocal()
  • isResolvable()

Ports

Ports on the given host can be retrieved with:

  • port(int) - The numbered port
  • port(Protocol, int) - The numbered port with the given protocol
  • ftp()
  • ftp(int)
  • hazelcast()
  • hazelcast(int)
  • http()
  • http(int)
  • https()
  • https(int)
  • mongo()
  • mysql()
  • sftp()
  • sftp(int)

Conversions

  • asString(Format)

Comparison

  • compareTo(Host)
